channel.title: Progress Reports on Bhrugu Bhatt
channel.description: Recent content in Progress Reports on Bhrugu Bhatt

item.title: April-August, 2021
item.description: 4/2 - COMPLETED THE COURSE “Mathematics for Machine Learning: Linear Algebra” 5/6 - COMPLETED THE COURSE “Mathematics for Machine Learning: Multivariate Calculus” 5/7 - Uploaded all Signature 3 materials into a folder including the presentation, background paper, certificates of course completion, all notes for the courses, all code and exercises from courses into Github. Did not upload recorded video of MML presentation. 5/8 - Uploaded recorded video of MML presentation.

item.title: February, 2021
item.description: 2/15 - I found a new dataset that would allow me to have “A new machine learning approach to classifying immature leukemic blasts from normal cells in Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (ALL)”. I sent an email to Mr. Writer requesting him to provide feedback on it and see if it was good for our purposes. He said that he would check it out and get back to me in a few days.

item.title: March, 2021
item.description: 3/1 - Received email reply from Sara Hosseinzadeh Kassani regarding the C-NMC Dataset. “Regarding your inquiries, i) the dataset is severely skewed in ALL cases; you definitely need to do some data augmentation or provide external cases. ii) the results of applying deep architectures have the issue of underfitting; therefore, extracting features from deep architectures and using machine learning classifiers might resolve this issue. Iii) no specific pre-processing steps are needed as the dataset is already pre-processed by the challenge providers.

item.title: Research Website Creation - 10/27/2021
item.description: Created research digital portfolio using Hugo and Github pages.
